column2: BRIEF-Star Group, L.P. Reports Fiscal 2018 Second Quarter Results May 2 (Reuters) - Star Group LP: * STAR GROUP, L.P. REPORTS FISCAL 2018 SECOND QUARTER RESULTS * STAR GROUP LP- FOR FISCAL 2018 Q2, REPORTED A 28.6 PERCENT INCREASE IN REVENUE TO $684.0 MILLION COMPARED WITH REVENUE OF $532.1 MILLION IN PRIOR-YEAR PERIOD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Star Group L.P. Increases Quarterly Distribution To 11.75 Cents/Unit April 17 (Reuters) - Star Group LP: * STAR GROUP, L.P. INCREASES QUARTERLY DISTRIBUTION TO 11.75 CENTS PER UNIT * STAR GROUP LP - INCREASED QUARTERLY DISTRIBUTION FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED MARCH 31, 2018 TO $0.1175 PER UNIT FROM $0.1100 PER UNIT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
